Package com.cafean.client.ui

Interface ConnectionRenderer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FullScreenDrawing
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConnectionLineRenderer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DrawnConnection
    public interface ConnectionRenderer
extends FullScreenDrawing
    An interface describing a renderer for "connections" in a BeanBox. This does not necessarily have to be a DrawnConnection object but could instead be a renderer for a set of connections or a component that is essentially a set of connections.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void componentRemoved​(DrawnComponent comp)
      This should be called by the view when a drawn component has been removed.
      void componentReshaped​(DrawnComponent comp)
      Called to notify this renderer that the given DrawnComponent has been reshaped a way that this renderer may need to compensate for.
      void connectionPointRemoved​(DrawnComponent comp)
      Called to notify this renderer that a connection point has been removed from the given drawn component that may affect the drawing of this renderer.
      boolean isStraightLine()
      Returns true if this connection renderer will draw the connection as a straight line between single pair of points.
      void setGeneratePoints​(boolean generate)
      If set to false, the points in this renderer should be regenerated based on the connected drawn components.
      void setStraightLine​(boolean straightLine)
      If set to true, this connection renderer will draw the connection as a straight line between single pair of points.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cafean.client.ui.FullScreenDrawing

        getUsedBounds, translate

    • Method Detail

      • componentRemoved

        void componentRemoved​(DrawnComponent comp)
        This should be called by the view when a drawn component has been removed. If the given DrawnComponent is this renderer's only source or target, it may itself as well.
        Parameters:
        comp - the DrawnComponent that was removed

      • componentReshaped

        void componentReshaped​(DrawnComponent comp)
        Called to notify this renderer that the given DrawnComponent has been reshaped a way that this renderer may need to compensate for.
        Parameters:
        comp - the DrawnComponent that was reshaped

      • connectionPointRemoved

        void connectionPointRemoved​(DrawnComponent comp)
        Called to notify this renderer that a connection point has been removed from the given drawn component that may affect the drawing of this renderer.
        Parameters:
        comp - the DrawnComponent from which a connection point was removed

      • setGeneratePoints

        void setGeneratePoints​(boolean generate)
        If set to false, the points in this renderer should be regenerated based on the connected drawn components.

      • isStraightLine

        boolean isStraightLine()
        Returns true if this connection renderer will draw the connection as a straight line between single pair of points. If false, the normal behavior will be used.
        Returns:
        true if single straight line will be drawn

      • setStraightLine

        void setStraightLine​(boolean straightLine)
        If set to true, this connection renderer will draw the connection as a straight line between single pair of points. If false, the normal behavior will be used.
        Parameters:
        straightLine - true to draw a single straight line
